newsitem.title: USA: RTRS-Foster's says buyback is an option.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Foster's says buyback is an option.

text.p: A buyback, capital return or special dividend could be on the agenda if Australian-based Foster's Brewing Group Ltd fails to significantly boost its value through an aggressive restructuring and investment programme over the next 12 months.
Foster's president and chief executive officer Ted Kunkel told the McIntosh investment conference on Wednesday that the brewer would do whatever was necessary to improve returns to its shareholders.
Kunkel said he was confident a resurgent Foster's would grow sufficiently to satisfy shareholders, but a buyback was an option once the company returned to full tax-paying status in Australia.
"Our first priority after satisfying the operating business cash needs is to seek out new direct investment opportunities with the right return profile," he said.

"Should that not fully utilise the available financial resources, efficient capital usage will demand that we consider some other form of capital restructuring which could be in the form of a buyback, capital return or special dividend."
